This is called skill in dependent arising.
Moreover, how does the cessation of the aggregates cease?

It means that when incorrect thought ceases, then ignorance ceases. When ignorance ceases, then karmic formations cease. When karmic formations cease, then consciousness ceases. When consciousness ceases, then name-and-form cease. When name-and-form cease, then the six sense bases cease. When the six sense bases cease, then contact ceases. When contact ceases, then feeling ceases. When feeling ceases, then craving ceases. When craving ceases, then grasping ceases. When grasping ceases, then becoming ceases. When becoming ceases, then birth ceases. When birth ceases, then old age, death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, and distress cease. And within this, one attains such knowledge.

Moreover, skill in dependent origination means that all dharmas are dependent on the convergence of causes and conditions, and thus one is able to uphold the absence of self, the absence of person, the absence of sentient being, and the absence of life. One attains the absence of conceptualization regarding such things.

And the bodhisattvas, regarding this dependent origination, are further able to establish all buddha-dharmas and the characteristics of enlightenment.
